project.script: Hi, I'm Daniel, and I've been playing drums for over 20 years. I've played in bands, toured, and recorded albums. I'm passionate about teaching others how to play drums, and I'm confident that I can help you reach your drumming goals. I offer private lessons for students of all ages and skill levels. If you're interested in learning how to play drums, I encourage you to contact me and book a free session. Looking forward to hearing from you.

video_segments.script: Hi, I'm Daniel, and I've been playing drums for over 20 years. I've played in bands, toured, and recorded albums. I'm passionate about teaching others how to play drums, and I'm confident that I can help you reach your drumming goals.

I offer private lessons for students of all ages and skill levels. If you're interested in learning how to play drums, I encourage you to contact me and book a free session. Looking forward to hearing from you.
